      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBQuery(java.sql.Connection con, int pQueryType, java.lang.String query)
      Creation of a query object for a Batched operation, requires a DBHelper which supplies the connection, the text of a query, the list of query parameters are added by the addBatch(List Params).
      DBQuery(java.sql.Connection con, int pQueryType, java.lang.String query, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params)
      Creation of a query object requires a DBHelper which supplies the connection, the text of a query, and a list of query parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBQuery

        public DBQuery(java.sql.Connection con,
       int pQueryType,
       java.lang.String query,
       java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creation of a query object requires a DBHelper which supplies the connection, the text of a query, and a list of query parameters.
        Parameters:
        pQueryType - the type of the query SQL (define as class constants)
        query - The SQL query to execute.
        params - A List of Objects, each of which should at runtime be one of Integer, Long, Date, String.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • DBQuery

        public DBQuery(java.sql.Connection con,
       int pQueryType,
       java.lang.String query)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creation of a query object for a Batched operation, requires a DBHelper which supplies the connection, the text of a query, the list of query parameters are added by the addBatch(List Params).
        Parameters:
        pQueryType - the type of the query SQL (define as class constants)
        query - The SQL query to execute.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
